title: Premier Group Insurance Offering
summary: The slide promotes Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance, underwritten by United States Fire Insurance Company, and offered exclusively to NCE Members. It features an image of three people socializing, which likely conveys a sense of community and well-being associated with the insurance offerings.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance Plans
summary: The slide presents a detailed comparison of various insurance plans and their benefits. It outlines different levels of coverage for hospital and outpatient services, including daily hospital confinement, emergency room visits, surgeries, and diagnostic tests. Additionally, a section on group accident benefits is included, specifically accidental death and hospital admission benefits. The slide specifies a 30-day waiting period for sickness-related claims.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Description of Benefits
summary: The slide outlines various benefits provided under a hospital indemnity policy. It details different types of benefits such as Hospital Admission Benefit, Daily Hospital Confinement Benefit, Daily Intensive Care/Coronary Care Unit Benefit, Daily Inpatient Surgery Benefit, Daily Inpatient Surgery Anesthesia Benefit, and Daily Emergency Room Visits Benefit for Sickness and Injury. Each benefit includes conditions for eligibility and termination of payments. The slide also includes a brief disclaimer about the coverage, subject to policy terms and conditions.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Description of Benefits
summary: The slide outlines various hospital benefits under a fixed indemnity plan. It includes benefits for daily outpatient surgery, anesthesia, physician's office visits, inpatient and outpatient diagnostic radiology, and laboratory tests. Each section specifies the conditions under which benefits are paid, such as confinement status and physician orders.

title: Group Accident Description of Benefits
summary: The slide details various benefits under a group accident policy, including Hospital Admission Benefit, Daily Hospital Confinement Benefit, Daily Physician’s Office Visits Benefit, Daily Emergency Room Visits Benefit for Sickness and Injury, Daily Intensive Care/Coronary Care Unit Benefit, Daily Inpatient Surgery Anesthesia Benefit, and Daily Outpatient Surgery Anesthesia Benefit. Each benefit has specific conditions and payment end dates outlined.

title: Group Accident Description of Benefits
summary: The slide provides a detailed description of various benefits available under a group accident policy. It includes six main sections: Daily Inpatient Surgery Benefit, Daily Outpatient Surgery Benefit, Daily Inpatient Diagnostic Radiology, X-ray and Imaging Benefits, Daily Outpatient Diagnostic Radiology, X-ray and Imaging Benefits, Daily Inpatient Laboratory Test Benefit, and Daily Outpatient Laboratory Test Benefit. Each section outlines the conditions under which the benefits are applicable, definitions of key terms, and exclusions.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Benefit Exclusions
summary: This slide outlines the exclusions for the Limited Fixed Indemnity insurance portion of a membership. It lists 23 specific situations where coverage does not apply, such as self-inflicted injuries, participation in a riot, treatment for substance abuse, and experimental procedures. Each exclusion is detailed to specify the conditions under which coverage is denied.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Benefit Exclusions
summary: This slide outlines specific exclusions for a fixed indemnity benefit plan, including non-coverage for treatments related to motor vehicle accidents without a valid license, vision care, and certain types of travel. It also highlights limitations on pre-existing conditions, specifying that these will not be covered for the first 12 months of the policy. Additional exclusions include elective cosmetic surgery and physiotherapy services. The slide emphasizes that the insurance is a limited policy, not a comprehensive medical plan.

title: Group Accident Benefit Exclusions
summary: The slide lists exclusions for a Group Accident Benefit Certificate, detailing situations and causes of loss not covered. These include intentional harm, war, military service, participation in riots, medical conditions, substance influence, and various specific medical treatments and conditions. It highlights that these exclusions apply even if the immediate cause of loss is accidental.

title: Group Accident Benefit Exclusions
summary: This slide details exclusions from group accident benefits, specifically listing items and scenarios not covered by the insurance policy. Exclusions include treatments related to TMJ disorders, dental care not related to accidents, blood plasma treatments, and various vehicle-related accidents. Also excluded are activities such as flying in non-commercial aircraft, participation in sports contests, and cosmetic surgeries. The slide emphasizes that the policy is limited to specific losses from accidents only, and is not a substitute for comprehensive health insurance.

title: Termination of Insurance
summary: The slide outlines the conditions for the termination of insurance for policyholders, insured persons, and dependents. It details the specific events that trigger termination, such as expiration dates, non-payment of premiums, and requests for termination. It also includes a section on insurance premiums, specifying the costs associated with different coverage levels.

title: NCE Association Membership Overview
summary: The slide provides information about the National Congress of Employers (NCE), its membership benefits, and insurance plans. Key sections include 'What is NCE?' which outlines the purpose and services of the NCE, 'Membership Packet and ID Cards' detailing the membership processing and delivery, 'Premier Plan Insured Benefits' explaining the insurance coverage and conditions, and 'Insurance Eligibility Information' specifying eligibility criteria for insurance plans.

title: NCE Association Membership Benefits Overview
summary: The slide provides an overview of the benefits available through the NCE Association Membership, highlighting no waiting periods or pre-existing condition limitations. Key benefits include medical, pharmacy, vision, dental, hearing, and alternative care discounts. It introduces the GapAfford Plus program, which offers financial savings on medical expenses with no deductibles, medical exams, claim forms, usage limitations, age restrictions, or pre-existing condition limitations. Additionally, it explains the First Health Network Provider Network Discounts, which offer savings on services using a network provider, applicable in all 50 states.

title: NCE Association Membership Benefits - GapAfford Plus
summary: The slide provides an overview of the benefits included in the GapAfford Plus membership. It covers various discount programs and services, including prescription discounts, dental access, vision care, hearing savings, imaging, medical supplies, laboratory savings, physical therapy, chiropractic care, and vitamin discounts. Additional services such as 24/7 health information and nurse help line are also detailed. Each section outlines specific savings percentages and service features.
